lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Heeeey chief...

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: So… do you know Paisley?

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: This absolute worrywart has been keeping tabs on me this whole time!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: I… am not exactly sure how to feel about this…

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: But at least I’m glad it all turned out for the better!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: The party was about to be a total disaster, until she came along and turned things around.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: I’m gonna tell you all about it, but first - I’m parched. Could you make me something herbaceous and mild?

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: No, chief, that won’t do!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: It’s kind of strong-tasting, and I can’t get the floral notes in there.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Nothing bad with bland teas, of course! It’s just that I don’t want to get one for myself right now.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Please make it again. Remember -  mild, and floral. Thanks!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Thank you chief! Once again, you knocked it out of the park!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Now that is much better! Thanks! I hope I wasn’t too much of a trouble for you, hehe~

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: I hope you don’t mind my rambling.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Truth be told, it feels a tiny bit daunting. How much freedom I have right now.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: But I think it’s for the better. I need to know how to function on my own!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: And speaking of it - guess what? I’m going to a party tomorrow!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: I’ve gotten an invitation from my friends at school, and I am so stoked to go there!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: First party… which I will attend… on my own…

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Now that I mention it - do you think I can go wearing what I wear right now? I just love this asymmetric crop top, I think it goes well with the rest of my fit.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Plus it feels breezy, too! Perfect for a summer heat!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: What do you think?

options.line: Just wear what you love and let your personality shine.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Oh stop it, you charmer you. You’re gonna make me blush!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Do you really think so? That wasn’t my intention at all, but I’m going to keep that in mind.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: That’s easy for you to say, I bet you are the heart of every party out there!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Still, thanks for your input. I knew I could count on you!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: I had to ask you, because for some reason, I keep getting stared at, and I don’t know if that was because of my outfit, or because of… because of who I am.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: But really, I think I kind of got used to the staring! If you only knew how bad it was before I came out.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: It felt like their eyes were really boring into me. Like they were about to figure out that I was only pretending to be a boy.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: But someone taught me to not care about what they think. That I should live my life true to myself, and to not bother with opinions of naysayers!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: It’s kinda sad that this was the reason why we broke up… but maybe it was me who took it too far.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: I mean, she had the best intentions at heart. I just know it.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: But she’s not someone who would just come around like that. She’s got too strong of a spirit to change on behalf of just a single gal!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Ugghhh, I’m sorry for bringing it up again.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Anyway, the party is going to be happening at Mincy’s house, Parkway Avenue 97. I would be stoked if you could join!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: But you’re… probably going to be attending the shop…

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Sorry for mentioning it. I’m such a silly goof. Hehe~

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Anyway, thanks for the tea! Have a good day!
